GREX  Gene expression imputation class for TWAS pipelines
      Converts genotype files to TWAS-compatible formats and applies 
      model weights to generate predicted gene expression (GREX).

   obj = GREX(twas_approach, grex_region, twas_genotypes_dir, output_grex_file)

   Syntax:
       obj.slice_bgen(input_dir, cleanup)
       obj.apply_weights(samples, samp_file)

   Description:
       The GREX class handles genotype processing and gene expression 
       prediction for different TWAS model frameworks. It supports both 
       summary-based (MetaXcan, UTMOST, JTI) and genotype-based (FUSION) 
       approaches. The class automates:
           • BGEN slicing to model-specific SNPs
           • Conversion of genotypes to dosage files
           • Application of model weights (via PLINK2 or MetaXcan scripts)
           • Generation of HDF5 files containing predicted expression

   Inputs:
       twas_approach        String specifying model family ('FUS', 'PDX', 'UTM', 'JTI')
       grex_region          Target tissue or region name (e.g., 'Brain_Cortex')
       twas_genotypes_dir   Directory containing chromosome-level genotype files
       output_grex_file     Output HDF5 path for storing predicted expression

   Outputs:
       GREX object with:
           • .slice_bgen()    Converts BGENs or PLINK2 sets to model-specific inputs
           • .apply_weights() Generates predicted GREX matrices (genes × samples)
           • Output file: <output_grex_file>.hdf5 containing:
               - 'genes'      : gene identifiers
               - 'pred_expr'  : predicted expression matrix

   See also:
       TWAS, SummaryTWAS, GenotypeTWAS, Project
